name: CreateEventType
description:
Create a new one-on-one event type in Calendly.

This tool is used to create a new one-on-one event type in Calendly. It is useful when scheduling personalized meetings or appointments.

parameters.name: event_type_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details for the new event type such as name, owner, description, duration, active status, locations, color, and locale.

active.description: Indicates if the event type is active or not

owner.description: The owner for this event type

duration.description: The length of sessions booked with this event type. Must be one of the duration options if they're provided.

duration_options.description: A maximum of 4 unique options is allowed. Each option must be >= 1 and <= 720.

locations.description: Configuration information for each possible location for this event type

color.description: The hexadecimal color value of the event type's scheduling page

locale.description: The locale on the event type, used to determine the language of the event type's scheduling page

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the calendly API.

active.description: Indicates if the event type is active or not

owner.description: The owner for this event type

duration.description: The length of sessions booked with this event type. Must be one of the duration options if they're provided.

duration_options.description: A maximum of 4 unique options is allowed. Each option must be >= 1 and <= 720.

locations.description: Configuration information for each possible location for this event type

color.description: The hexadecimal color value of the event type's scheduling page

locale.description: The locale on the event type, used to determine the language of the event type's scheduling page

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
